meanings.meaning: 1. large; big; great; huge; vast; major; important; serious; severe 嵐は作物に大損害を与えた。The storm did great harm to the crop.
2. great; prominent; eminent; distinguished
3. -sized; as big as; the size of 瞬くうちにテニスボール大の団子が消え去った。In the blink of an eye, the tennis-ball-sized dumpling had disappeared.
4. university Abbreviation, See also 大学彼女はハーバード大に入学した。She was accepted at Harvard.
5. large (e.g. serving size); large option 大か、小か。Large or small?
6. long month (i.e. having 31 days) Abbreviation, See also 大の月
1. large; big; great; major; important; serious; heavy; loud See also 大 だい
2. older; senior
3. final; ultimate
4. rough; broad; general
5. Massive
1. nth year in the Taishō era (1912.7.30-1926.12.25) Abbreviation, See also 大正

sentences.translation: The storm did great harm to the crop.
In the blink of an eye, the tennis-ball-sized dumpling had disappeared.
She was accepted at Harvard.
Large or small?

meanings.meaning: 1. great; grand; large Archaic
2. greater (of equal court ranks); upper; senior See also 従 ひろき, also written as 正
3. a great deal; very much See also 大きに
大 【おおき】
大: Irregular okurigana usage.
1. big; large; great Archaic, Only applies to 大い, See also 大いなる, See also 大いに
2. greater (of equal court ranks); upper; senior Archaic, See also 従 ひろい, also written as 正
大 【おおい】
1. university; college あなたは理科系の大学に進んだほうがいいよ。You should go on to a technical college.

2. former imperial university of Japan (established under the ritsuryō system for the training of government administrators) Historical term, Abbreviation, See also 大学寮合格者の過半数は大学出身者であった。The majority of the successful candidates were university graduates.
3. the Great Learning (one of the Four Books) See also 四書

大學 【だいがく】

The majority of the successful candidates were university graduates.

大通 【おおどおり】
1. very; greatly; terribly; awfully １日中歩き回って大変疲れた。I am dead tired from walking around all day.
2. immense; enormous; great あえて言いますが、もし我々がそんなことをすれば大変な誤りを犯すことになると私は思います。At the risk of sticking my neck out, I think that if we do that, we're making a big, big mistake.
3. serious; grave; dreadful; terrible もし期限切れになったら、大変なことになるよ。There will be hell to pay if I don't make this deadline.
4. difficult; hard; challenging
5. major incident; disaster Archaic
大へん 【たいへん】
1. very; greatly; terribly; awfully １日中歩き回って大変疲れた。I am dead tired from walking around all day.
2. immense; enormous; great あえて言いますが、もし我々がそんなことをすれば大変な誤りを犯すことになると私は思います。At the risk of sticking my neck out, I think that if we do that, we're making a big, big mistake.
3. serious; grave; dreadful; terrible もし期限切れになったら、大変なことになるよ。There will be hell to pay if I don't make this deadline.
4. difficult; hard; challenging
5. major incident; disaster Archaic
大へん 【たいへん】

sentences.translation: I am dead tired from walking around all day.
At the risk of sticking my neck out, I think that if we do that, we're making a big, big mistake.
There will be hell to pay if I don't make this deadline.

meanings.meaning: 1. big; large; great See also 小さな
1. big; large; great See also 小さな
1. big; large; great きみは何と大きい家を持っているんだろう。What a big house you have!
2. loud もっと大きい声で言ってください。Louder, please.
3. extensive; spacious
4. important; decisive; valuable
5. older; grown up
1. big; large; great きみは何と大きい家を持っているんだろう。What a big house you have!

Louder, please.

meanings.meaning: 1. important; significant; serious; crucial 柔道では力より技のほうが大切である。In judo, technique is more important than strength.
2. precious; valuable; dear; cherished; beloved 大切なものはここに置かないで下さい。Please don't leave valuable things here.
3. careful See also 大切に, usu. adverbially as ～に私は古い本を大切に保存している。I keep old books with care.
大切 【たいせち】
たいせち: Out-dated or obsolete kana usage.
1. important; significant; serious; crucial 柔道では力より技のほうが大切である。In judo, technique is more important than strength.
2. precious; valuable; dear; cherished; beloved 大切なものはここに置かないで下さい。Please don't leave valuable things here.
3. careful See also 大切に, usu. adverbially as ～に私は古い本を大切に保存している。I keep old books with care.
大切 【たいせち】
たいせち: Out-dated or obsolete kana usage.

sentences.translation: In judo, technique is more important than strength.
Please don't leave valuable things here.
I keep old books with care.

meanings.meaning: 1. liking very much; loving (something or someone); adoring; being very fond of
1. liking very much; loving (something or someone); adoring; being very fond of
1. safe; secure; sound; problem-free; without fear; all right; alright; OK; okay 彼女は今のところ大丈夫です。She is all right at the moment.
2. certainly; surely; undoubtedly
3. no thanks; I'm good; that's alright Colloquialいや、大丈夫だ。No, no, that's okay.
4. great man; fine figure of a man Archaic, Only applies to だいじょうぶ, See also 大丈夫 だいじょうふ
大丈夫 【だいじょぶ】
1. safe; secure; sound; problem-free; without fear; all right; alright; OK; okay 彼女は今のところ大丈夫です。She is all right at the moment.
2. certainly; surely; undoubtedly
3. no thanks; I'm good; that's alright Colloquialいや、大丈夫だ。No, no, that's okay.
4. great man; fine figure of a man Archaic, Only applies to だいじょうぶ, See also 大丈夫 だいじょうふ
大丈夫 【だいじょぶ】

sentences.translation: She is all right at the moment.
No, no, that's okay.

meanings.meaning: 1. important; serious; crucial あなたの親切な言葉は大事に心に刻みつけておきます。I'll treasure your kind words.
2. valuable; precious 彼は私たちにとって大事な人だ。He is precious to us.
3. serious matter; major incident; matter of grave concern; crisis See also 大事 おおごと
4. great undertaking; great enterprise; great thing
5. safe; OK See also だいじょうぶ, Tochigi dialect

sentences.translation: I'll treasure your kind words.
He is precious to us.
